content: hand-knitted pollack charm in korea there is an old folk belief that hanging a pollack tied with thread on the door can drive away bad luck young people who are interested in korean traditions sometimes make pollack charms as accessories or small dolls wishing that these little charms will take away their misfortune dear knitters why not make your own hand-knitted pollack charm this small charm is about 7 cm tall and can be used as a keyring or attached to your bag you can also create it in various sizes by adjusting the needle and yarn thickness may your hand-knitted pollack charm bring you only good energy and happiness ⓒ copyright 2020 jaunaryknit all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction or commercial use of this design is permitted
